name: ovid-international-landing
description: Modern landing page for Ovid International Ltd - Kenyan tech company

scripts.audit: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 5 && npm run lighthouse && pkill -f vite
scripts.audit:mobile: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 5 && npm run lighthouse:mobile && pkill -f vite
scripts.performance:check: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 5 && npx web-vitals && pkill -f vite
scripts.bundle:analyze: npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
scripts.test:performance: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 5 && npx lighthouse http://localhost:4173 --only-categories=performance --output=json --output-path=./performance-report.json && pkill -f vite
scripts.speed:test: npm run build:production && npm run preview & sleep 3 && npm run lighthouse && pkill -f vite
scripts.performance:optimize: npm run build && npm run performance:analyze

author: Ovid International Ltd
